title: Planning for school effectiveness: program budgeting
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict management
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Educational evaluation - Australia
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers and community
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School management and organisation
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conflict management
description: Explains school-based program budgeting using detailed examples of the highly effective approach at Rosebery District High School, Tasmania. Considers policy making and planning community and staff involvement, management of conflict, building consensus, and evaluation. No other credits available.
